welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Delray Beach, where the warm sun, beautiful beaches, and vibrant arts scene await you. We hope you enjoy exploring our charming city and all it has to offer!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at BCT airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at BCT airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights operated by low-cost airlines such as Southwest and JetBlue.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights operated by major airlines such as Delta and United.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights operated by various airlines, including Spirit and Allegiant.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights operated by various airlines, including Air Canada and British Airways.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Premium WiFi is also available for purchase.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Fort Lauderdale Executive Airport serves commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Fort Lauderdale Executive Airport caters to private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
